permissions: Admin users can create projects file imports. Non-admin users can create imports for brokers they are members of (based on the broker associated with the file import or subject).
side_effects: Creates a projects file import record and enqueues asynchronous processing. If not a dry run, the import processes the file, writes results, and updates the related file import metadata.
validation_notes: --file-import and --file-import-type are required. --subject-type and --subject-id must be set together; if both are omitted, the subject defaults to the file import broker. file_import_type must be supported for the broker and must match a supported importer type. The file import attachment must be an allowed file type for the selected importer. The subject and file import must belong to the same broker.

flags.name: --file-import-type
flags.validation: Must be a supported file import type for the broker. Example: SageProjectsFileImport.
